mods.abstract: Four color window card (black, red, yellow and orange on white) Hatch poster announcing the Mid-Summer Festival in Rainesville on Monday, September 2 through Saturday, September 7. Event features Dixie Exposition Shows. Poster features woodcut of show tents.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
